Name: Oik 2
About the game: Casual physics puzzle. The player's goal to keep the blue block on the platform for 3 seconds in order to pass the level. - 60 levels - 365 Achievements - Relax music Oik 2 - Puzzle in the style of Zup! Credits 'Oik 2' powered by Clickteam Fusion 2.5 Music: Delone
